name: bcs-c12-sql-employeetracker
description: EmployeeTracker is a command-line application to manage a company's employee database. The app uses Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL. As the app is not deployed, a link to a walkthrough video is provided at the end of this README. /The github repository for the app is found here: https://github.com/mcleanGit/StaffTrack.
